org.waarp.common.logging

Class WaarpJdkLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.common.logging.AbstractWaarpLogger
      • org.waarp.common.logging.WaarpJdkLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, WaarpLogger

    public class WaarpJdkLogger
extends AbstractWaarpLogger
    java.util.logging logger.

      • trace

        public final void trace(String format,
                        Object arg)
        Log a message at level FINEST according to the specified format and argument.

        This form avoids superfluous object creation when the logger is disabled for level FINEST.

        Parameters:
        format - the format string
        arg - the argument
